short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides twitter view count on tweets

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do you not want to see the twitter views analytics button on twitter? This extension removes all references to the view analytics button to return twitter to a more streamlined experience
